original_text: Melchizedek was the king of Salem, and he was a priest of the Most High God. He brought out bread and wine for Abram.
korean_text: 살렘 왕 멜기세덱이 떡과 포도주를 가지고 나왔으니 그는 지극히 높으신 하나님의 제사장이었더라

sentences.original_text: Melchizedek was the king of Salem
he was a priest of the Most High God
He brought out bread and wine for Abram
